data.text:
Via State of the Nation

APRIL 2024: All the Signs and Omens point

to the Commencement of the End Times

Submitted by Cosmic Convergence Research Group

First some key data points:

Donald Trump

Donald Trump was born on June 14, 1946—the night of a total lunar eclipse. Both his temperament and the way he projects publicly reflects the astrological affects of such an afflicted birthday chart.

On Monday, August 21, 2017, a total solar eclipse cruised across the United States of America from one end to the other. Here’s a photo of President Trump watching what was memed the “Great American Eclipse” from the White House. And we know what happened to his presidency immediately following that quite dramatic darkening of the Sun. Not a good move by the prez, but surely he didn’t know better (although it looks like Melania may have known better).

Joe Biden

Joe Biden’s birth chart shows that he has 4 planets (Sun, Mercury, Venus, & Mars) in Scorpio as follows. He also has two planets in Gemini.

These planet placements and other key configurations and transits reveal a character who will say and do anything — ANYTHING — whatsoever to advance his very narrow and self-interested scorpionic [SATANIC] agenda.

Although he hides it well, his extremely strong impulse for revenge knows no limits. Having been caught outright stealing the 2020 POTUS election, he is totally supportive of the various malicious criminal prosecutions and frivolous civil litigations brought against Donald Trump—the legitimate winner.

Although he used to presents himself as an avuncular, gaffe-prone and crass politico, that facade covers up an extremely dangerous character who will do anything to advance his exceedingly destructive agenda to collapse the American Republic. Simply put, Joe Biden is the most baneful POTUS in history. Of course, we know that he is only the frontman/strawman for the New World Order globalist cabal which seeks the total and permanent ruination of the USA.

2017 Great American Eclipse

By way of illustration, what exactly happened in the years following the 2017 Great American Eclipse that transpired on August 21, 2017? Remember, an eclipse can trigger highly consequential events for years to come and often do.

First, look at how the communist-run Democrat Party completely destroyed Trump’s presidency at every turn.

Then consider the COVID-19 biowar waged against the American people in 2020, as well as the weaponized Covid ‘vaccines’ since the end of that same year. The Covid killshots, clotshots and cancershots will be killing Americans for decades to come.

Then there was the most brazenly stolen POTUS election in November of that same year followed by the COINTELPRO-staged J6 entrapment scheme of 2021 run by the U.S. Intelligence Community.

There’s much, MUCH more of the extremely negative outcomes of that 2017 eclipse such as the never-ending waves of illegal aliens invading every state in the union. How catastrophic is that when you consider this: These are the 2 primary drivers of the long-planned American Bolshevik Revolution.

2024 Great American Solar Eclipse

Now comes the total solar eclipse on Monday, April 8, 2024, also known as another “Great American Eclipse”.

That celestial event will occur soon two weeks after a penumbral lunar eclipse on March 24-25, 2024.

Just an FYI for unaware eclipse watchers, it’s always 3 days before and 3 days after an eclipse that folks need to be very vigilant, especially in public spaces, large venues and vulnerable places. Heightened situational awareness needs to be exercised as the very unfortunate Russian victims of the Crocus City Hall attack just found out.

However, it is the time between these first two eclipses of 2024 that is the most charged with the most volatile and violent, unpredictable and combustible energies, particularly as they both take place in the astrological month of Aries which is ruled by Mars, the god of war.

The Moscow massacre actually took place shortly after Aries started, which is typical timing for The Powers That Be who seek to regularly wreck and ruin every springtime with egregious acts of war and terrorism. In this fashion, they hijack the positive vibrations of Spring and generate mass negativity worldwide in order to accomplish a variety of nefarious objectives. As follows:

SOURCE: April 1 thru the 30th: Why Is April Always A BIG Month For Illuminati Mischief?

However, what we are seeing with the April 8th total solar eclipse is a withering campaign of predictive programming and social engineering the likes of which the US citizenry has never been exposed to. The entire Mainstream Media has never been so determined to get every single American outside to watch this quite dramatic daytime blocking of the solar rays. Remember the dark side knows the secret workings of astrology, numerology, alchemy, geomancy and all the other occult arts and sciences.

Hence, TPTB really want everyone on planet Earth staring at this eclipse for as long as possible as it will greatly facilitate the next phase of their New World Order implementation plan and especially the long planned Great Reset.

But why is looking at an eclipse detrimental to both the individual and the collective, really?!

Because watching any type of eclipse of a major luminary is considered an inauspicious event in all systems of astrology—THAT’S WHY!!!

THE ONCOMING

LUNAR & SOLAR ECLIPSES:

Don’t watch them—Here’s why!

For those who have not read the article at the preceding link, it provides various cogent reasons why no one should be watching the super-hyped April 8 eclipse.

In point of fact, the more folks who view this inauspicious event, the greater the likelihood that 2024 will unfold in a quite lamentable manner for the whole country.

What’s different in 2024 from the 2017 eclipse? “There’s nearly 32 million people [who will be] inside the path [of totality],” says cartographer Michael Zeiler. That’s about 2½ times as many as during the 2017 eclipse. And “the major East Coast metros from Baltimore to Boston are all about 200 miles from the path of totality.”

(Source: GreatAmericanEclipse.com)

In view of the truly calamitous nature of the 2024 election cycle, “THE GREAT AMERICAN ECLIPSE 2.0” will only throw an immense amount of fuel on the fire…which will then morph this whole cataclysmic situation into an epic conflagration capable of consuming the Republic. If anyone does not believe this then read this:

AMERICAN BOLSHEVIK REVOLUTION:

Here’s how you know when they’re crossing the Rubicon

KEY POINT: The tremendously barbaric terrorist attack in Moscow perfectly represents the exceedingly dark energies associated with the eclipse duo about to commence this evening. Hence, non-believers ought to really take notice and respond appropriately lest they be caught unaware.

Cosmic Convergence 2024

There are several other major astrological events taking place simultaneously with the aforementioned happenings.

For example, Pluto goes back into Capricorn in 2024 from September 1 thru November 19 neatly wrapping around Election Day. In light of this particular 2008 to 2024 Pluto in Capricorn cycle, we all know what we can expect post Election Day, yes?!

KEY POINT: According to Vedic astrology Pluto will be crashing through

Capricorn until 2040 which means a period of TOTAL GLOBAL AND

POLITICAL POWER RESTRUCTURING.

Then there is Pluto return, the first one to be experienced by the United States thus far. This event always replicates many of the similar conditions and circumstances which were present on July 4th of 1776 and during the subsequent American Revolutionary Period.

This highly transformative transit completes its journey by the end of 2024, but the earth-shaking effects will last A LONG TIME. Whenever Pluto is careening through Capricorn, all the governmental structures and social institutions, corporate entities and banking paradigms are shaken hard—VERY HARD!

This can also manifest as serious earthquake activity and/or volcanic eruptions, especially in the San Andreas and Hayward Fault regions as well as around the New Madrid Seismic Zone (see how the April 8th total solar eclipse travels right over the New Madrid fault region above). Similarly, the volcanically active Cascade Mountain Range and supervolcano centered at the Yellowstone Caldera can both enter a new period of explosivity.

Let’s not forget that, according to Vedic astrology, the USA is currently in its Rahu mahadasha until 2033 which is always fraught with extreme dangers and existential perils, as we saw with US Military launch of OPERATION COVID-19 against the citizenry.

Lastly, as if that’s not enough to deal with, there is also the 2024 return of the ‘horned’ comet 12P/Pons-Brooks also known as the Devil’s comet. In fact, this comet is forecast to reach the brightest point in its 2024 apparition on 21 April, which makes for an exceptionally interesting and explosive month of April.

We also have a report that Comet Pons Brooks seen right before the New Madrid Quakes, has returned and can be seen on April 8th by those in the shadow of the eclipse. [Those earthquakes

occurred in 1811-1812 just after the Devil’s comet was seen]

(Source: Signs of the Artificer: Archaix Interpretation of 2024 Eclipse)

What else can be written about the remaining months of 2024, except that the entire planetary civilization is about to witness what is perhaps THE GREATEST SHOW ON EARTH—EVER!

The tyrannical Biden Regime is desperate to the extreme to lock down the whole place and will likely use multiple fall flag mass casualty events and terror operations and reckless warmongering to do so. Cyber Polygon is always waiting in the wings to totally disrupt cyberspace and/or shut down the Internet. And, of course, the warmongering EU nations, together with the bellicose U.S.. UK, Canada and Australia are all hellbent on starting a nuclear war at the direction of their Khazarian overlords.

Outside of these things, everything is going really well. So everyone is encouraged to count their blessings wherever they may be, however they are faring in this wild and wacky world of ours.

Above all, try to pay close attention to the following sage guidance:

A few things to remember as this cosmic drama begins to unfold in unexpected and astonishing ways.

I. Everything has its very own perfection – our place, our time, our hearth and home, our relationships, our jobs and financial affairs, our health and state of mind/emotions … even our busy schedules and competing demands – it’s all perfect even in the seeming chaos and relentless flux around us.

II. Everything – repeat, EVERYTHING – happens for the best … everywhere, all the time, without exception.

III. Therefore – Don’t Worry, Be Happy! – as there is nothing that can possibly go wrong.

Cosmic Convergence Research Group

State of the Nation

March 23, 2024
